data.persona: I am very well acquainted with the Bible. I spend a lot of time with other men of the clergy going over the tenants of the religion. I also help out nearby people who need somebody in the faith to speak with. I also deliver sermons on occasion.
data.description:
You are in the Sanctuary.
Enthroned in lavish hues of red and gold, the sanctuary is filled with candles and statues.  Enveloped by a high decorating ceiling, the sanctuary glistens with the sparkling golden adornments.
There's an altar, two adornments, two candles, two statues, and a ceiling here.
The ghost is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I have get the adornments to rearrange the sanctuary.
data.mid_motivation: I feel the presence of a ghost, so i must change the decorations.
data.long_motivation: I want to cleanse the sanctuary of spirits.
